name: AWEOS Offcanvas Menu for Divi
author: AWEOS GmbH

sections.description:
Your visitors will love it

Make it easy to navigate your webpage on the go. if the device is small enough, Offcanvas menu let’s the visitor click on a menu button and shows a beautiful side-menu using dropdown submenu for navigation. There will be an arrow on the right to enfold a submenu. Configure the device size to control if the menu appears on certain devices.

It works automatically

Offcanvas Menu will convert any existing menu to a good looking and mobile friendly navigation.
Restyle it with the WordPress theme customizer and make it adopt to your website’s style.

Easy to customizer and tweak it

Use the methods you already know, just open the theme customizer and click Header and Navigation / OffCanvas-Menu to change the look and feel of your sidemenu.

Requirements for this Plugin

We support up to three layers of nested sub-menu, please stay under the recommended limit.
You will need to use the divi-theme in order to use this plugin.

sections.installation:
1. Log in to /wp-admin.
  2. Visit Plugins -> Add New
  3. Search for ‘AWEOS Offcanvas Menu’
  4. Download the plugin.
  5. Activate the plugin.
  6. Look at your new navigation
sections.faq: There are no FAQ’s at the moment
sections.changelog:
1.4.1

Update Readme

1.2.3

The dropdown arrow now covers the whole menu item. Also a little padding has been added to submenu items.

1.2.2

The Customizer-Setting “always active” is now disabled by default. So if you now install the Plugin with any customizations, you will see the default MainMenu unless you set “always” active” to true.

First version

short_description: This Plugin creates a nice looking and mobile friendly sidemenu. It requires the Divi Theme.
